t: Amazon.com | HOBIBEAR Womens Mens Wide Minimalist Barefoot Sneakers Zero Drop Shoes Lightweight Comfortable | Walking
s: I absolutely love these shoes, and the Hobibear brand in general. We ordered these shoes for our trip to Alaska. They are so comfy and roomy, and made really well. Great for walking a lot. The only thing I didn't love is the shoelaces. They just needed a little color.
